document.full_text: the west warned of more pressure on syria on tuesday if a crackdown against pro-democracy protests continues, hours after tanks stormed a city in the south, cradle of an uprising against baathist rule.
document.title: tanks storm south syria city as u.s. piles on pressure
lines_and_colors: the west warned of more pressure on syria on tuesday if a crackdown against pro-democracy protests continues, hours after tanks stormed a city in the south, cradle of an uprising against baathist rule.
